00146 #define ZCL_DEFINE_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS(moveToLevelCommandInd,\
00147                                                   moveCommandInd,\
00148                                                   stepCommandInd,\
00149                                                   stopCommandInd,\
00150                                                   moveToLevelWOnOffCommandInd,\

00152                                                   stepWOnOffCommandInd,\
00153                                                   stopWOnOffCommandInd)\

00155                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00156                      moveToLevelCommandInd), \
00157     DEFINE_COMMAND(moveCommand, ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_MOVE_COMMAND_ID,  \
00158                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00159                      moveCommandInd), \
00160     DEFINE_COMMAND(stepCommand, ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_STEP_COMMAND_ID,  \
00161                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00162                      stepCommandInd), \
00163     DEFINE_COMMAND(stopCommand, ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_STOP_COMMAND_ID,  \
00164                      COMMAND_OPTIONS(CLIENT_TO_SERVER, ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE, ZCL_COMMAND_ACK), \
00165                      stopCommandInd), \
00166     DEFINE_COMMAND(moveToLevelWOnOffCommand, ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_MOVE_TO_LEVEL_W_ONOFF_COMMAND_ID,  \

00183 #define LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00184 { \
00185    .id = LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00186    .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00187    .attributesAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00188    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00189    .commandsAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00190    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00191 }
00192 
00193 #define LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE(clattributes, clcommands) \
00194 { \
00195    .id = LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00196    .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY}, \
00197    .attributesAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT, \
00198    .attributes = (uint8_t *)clattributes, \
00199    .commandsAmount = ZCL_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT, \
00200    .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands \
00201 }
00202 
00203 #define DEFINE_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER(cltype, clattributes, clcommands) \
00204     LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_##cltype(clattributes, clcommands)
00205 
00206 #define DEFINE_LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_EXTENSION_FIELD_SET(value) \
00207     .clusterId = LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID, \
00208     .length = sizeof(uint8_t), \
00209     .currentLevel = value

00309     uint8_t           lastReportedValue;  
00310   } currentLevel;
